word_mean: 反论，奇论，自相矛盾，奇异现象：一种状态，似乎是(其实也可能不是)荒唐可笑或自我矛盾的

sentence.Network_en: He was a paradox—a loner who loved to chat to strangers.
sentence.Network_cn: 他真是个矛盾人物，生性孤僻却又喜欢和陌生人闲聊。

sentence.Network_en: Although strictly illogical, Martin's interpretation of this paradox seems the best.
sentence.Network_cn: 马丁对于这一悖论的解释尽管严格说来不合乎逻辑, 卻似乎是最好的解释了.

sentence.Network_en: The paradox is that the region's most dynamic economies have the most primitive financial systems.
sentence.Network_cn: 矛盾之处在于这个地区最有活力的经济体却有着最落后的金融体系。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 这是悖论（Paradox），是文字游戏，实际上就等于陈述句——“上帝不是全能的”，根本不能算一个问句，或问题！ 回答：2006-04-16 …
矛盾（Paradox），指表面看起来自相矛盾的论述或命题。矛盾中其实包含着机会，广告主应该利用这种矛盾中蕴涵的差异、变化和由 …
吊诡（paradox）又是另一回事，吊诡的情况是真实存在的，即使它是违反常理的。 基督徒的人生是充满吊诡的人生。
美国法庭词汇翻译 | 法律英语翻译 ... parade permit 游行示威许可 paradox 自相矛盾 paralegal 律师助理.

list.abs: 你肯定想到了伊斯特林悖论(Easterlin Paradox)。上世纪70年代，经济学家理查德•伊斯特林(Richard Easterlin)发现无法证明社会整体 …
寻找生命的支点：弗兰克... ... 1、去反省( de-reflection) 2、矛盾意向( paradoxical intention) 3、态度改变( attitude diversion).
法国悖论(French Paradox)：在1991年的一期美国 “60分钟时事杂志”('60 Minutes')的电视节目中发布的报告暗示说，红葡萄酒让法国 …
注：法国矛盾(French paradox)：法国人的饮食与其他西方国家一样，都是高热量高脂肪的饮食型态，不过法国人罹患心血管疾病的机 …
艾比林矛盾艾比林矛盾 (Abilene Paradox) 每一个人都发言表示同意的事，有可能是每个人心中都不乐意做的事吗？ 怎麽可能？

means.word_mean: 矛盾,自相矛盾,反论,自相矛盾的话
迷惑,困惑,疑难问题,似是而非的论点

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (originally denoting a statement contrary to accepted opinion): via late Latin from Greek paradoxon 'contrary (opinion'), neuter adjective used as a noun, from para- 'distinct from' + doxa 'opinion'

entry.tran: 自相矛盾；有矛盾特点的情况
entry.def: You describe a situation as a paradox when it involves two or more facts or qualities which seem to contradict each other.

example.ex: The paradox is that the region's most dynamic economies have the most primitive financial systems...
example.tran: 矛盾之处在于这个地区最有活力的经济体却有着最落后的金融体系。

example.ex: The paradox of exercise is that while using a lot of energy it seems to generate more...
example.tran: 锻炼奇怪的地方在于它会越活动越有劲。

entry.tran: 悖论；自相矛盾的说法；似矛盾而（可能）正确的说法
entry.def: A paradox is a statement in which it seems that if one part of it is true, the other part of it cannot be true.

example.ex: The story contains many levels of paradox...
example.tran: 这个故事存在多重悖论。

example.ex: Although I'm so successful I'm really rather a failure. That's a paradox, isn't it?
example.tran: 虽然我非常成功，可事实上我却是个相当失败的人。这句话自相矛盾，是吧？

sentences.sentence: "`I always lie' is a paradox because if it is true it must be false"

auth_sentence.content: Their statement is made a paradox by their existence.
auth_sentence.res_content: Their statement is made a paradox by their existence.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Their statement is made a paradox by their existence.

auth_sentence.content: The Dallas case illustrates the paradox of jury trial.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Dallas case illustrates the paradox of jury trial.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Dallas case illustrates the paradox of jury trial.

auth_sentence.content: Much has been written about this so-called Hispanic Paradox.
auth_sentence.res_content: Much has been written about this so-called Hispanic Paradox.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Much has been written about this so-called Hispanic Paradox.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"半,类似,辅助"; 2. 表示"降落伞"; 3. 表示"在旁边"

stems_affixes.word_buile: para半,类似,辅助+all全部+el→全部都很类似→类似的→匹敌

stems_affixes.value_cn: 准军事性的,起军事辅助作用的
stems_affixes.word_buile: para半,类似,辅助+military军事的→准军事的
para半,类似,辅助+political政治的→adj.半政治的
para半,类似,辅助+state国+al的→adj.半官方的
para在旁边+bol抛+ic的→adj.抛物线[状]的
para在旁边+noid=note注意→在旁边注意→怀疑的
para半,类似,辅助+legal法律的→辅助法律的
para半,类似,辅助+medic医师,实习医生→n.护理人员
para半,类似,辅助+phrase措词→v.解释 n.解释
para降落伞+chut落下+e→n.降落伞
para降落伞+drop扔下→n.空投,空降

stems_affixes.value_cn: 伞兵部队, 空降部队
stems_affixes.word_buile: para降落伞+troop部队+s→n.伞兵部队, 空降部队
para在旁边+digm显示→在旁边显示给[别人]→示范
para在旁边+dox观点→观点边上有观点→矛盾
para在旁边+gon角→旁边顶尖人物→典范
para在旁边+log说话逻辑+ism现象,状态→在逻辑边上→不是逻辑
para旁边+sit坐+e→坐在在旁边[吃]→吃白食→寄生虫,食客
para半,类似,辅助+all全部+el→全部都很类似→类似的→匹敌
para半,类似,辅助+phrase措词→v.解释 n.解释

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使瘫痪[麻痹];使丧失作用
stems_affixes.word_buile: para在旁边+lyze分开→旁边分开→瘫痪
hetero异+dox观点→异端思想

stems_affixes.value_cn: 传统的,正统的,习惯的,保守的,东正教的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ortho正+dox观点→正的观点
hetero异+dox观点→异端思想
para旁边+dox观点→观点边上有观点→矛盾

Sentence.sentence: The learning paradox is at the heart of "productive failure".
Why does the author call the learning process a paradox

means.word_mean: 似非而是的隽语, 看似矛盾而实际却可能正确的说法

sentences.en: The faster he tried to finish, the longer it seemed to take him.It is quite a paradox.
sentences.cn: 他越是想快点完成, 似乎就做得越慢, 这实在是很矛盾。

means.word_mean: 有矛盾特点的人[事物, 情况]

sentences.en: The paradox of earth is that it cradles life and then entombs life.
sentences.cn: 大地的奥妙在于它既生长万物, 亦埋葬万物。

jushi.english: The paradox of earth is that it cradles life and then entombs life.
jushi.chinese: 大地的奥妙在于它既生长万物,亦埋葬万物。

jushi.english: The faster he tried to finish, the longer it seemed to take him.It is quite a paradox.
jushi.chinese: 他越是想快点完成,似乎就做得越慢,这实在是很矛盾。
“欲速则不达”是一句似非而是的隽言。
